name: Rewind Forest
description:
OBJETIVE

Find your partner who has hidden deep in the forest.

HOW TO PLAY?

Use the arrow keys to move. 
Move closer to the sides of the screen to advance.
Look at the map and find the clues to select the right way.
The map will repeat until you go the right way.
Every time you make a mistake the screen will become darker.
10 hits to win, 6 mistakes to lose.

CREDITS:

- Music by Bert Cole www.bitbybitsound.com

- Characters by Sharm (Lanea Zimmerman) https://opengameart.org/content/tiny-16-basic

- Tileset by Buch https://opengameart.org/content/the-field-of-the-floating-islands
